text.1: þæt meotod hæfde      miht and strengðo
text.10: and he ariman mæg      rægnas scuran,
text.100: in ðissum neowlan genipe.      Hær is nedran swæg,
text.101: wyrmas gewunade.      Is ðis wites clom
text.103: dimme and deorce.      Ne her dæg lyhteð
text.106: ær ic moste in ðeossum atolan      æðele gebidan
text.107: hwæt me drihten god      deman wille,
text.108: fagum on flora.      Nu ic feran com
text.109: deofla menego      to ðissum dimman ham.
text.110: Ac ic sceal on flyge      and on flyhte ðragum
text.113: Ne ðurfon we ðes wenan,      þæt us wuldorcyning
text.115: æðel to æhte,      swa he ær dyde,
text.116: ecne onwald;      ah him alles gewald,
text.118: Forðon ic sceal hean and earm      hweorfan ðy widor,
text.12: seolua he gesette      þurh his soðan miht.
text.121: uppe mid ænglum,      þes ðe ic ær gecwæð
text.122: þæt ic wære seolfa      swægles brytta,
text.124: Swa se werega gast      wordum sæde
text.127: geond þæt atole scræf      attre geblonden):
text.128: "Ic eom limwæstmum      þæt ic gelutian ne mæg
text.129: on þyssum sidan sele,      synnum forwundod.
text.13: Swa se wyrhta      þurh his wuldres gast
text.130: Hwæt, her hat and ceald      hwilum mencgað;
text.133: niðer under næssum;      hwilum nacode men
text.134: winnað ymb wyrmas.      Is þes windiga sele
text.136: Ne mot ic hihtlicran      hames brucan,
text.137: burga ne bolda,      ne on þa beorhtan gescæft
text.138: ne mot ic æfre ma      eagum starian.
text.139: Is me nu wyrsa      þæt ic wuldres leoht
text.14: serede and sette      on six dagum
text.141: song on swegle,      þær sunu meotodes
text.143: seolfa mid sange.      Ne ic þam sawlum ne mot
text.145: butan þam anum      þe he agan nyle;
text.146: þa ic mot to hæftum      ham geferian,
text.147: bringan to bolde      in þone biteran grund.
text.149: þonne þe we iu in heofonum      hæfdon ærror
text.150: wlite and weorðmynt.      Ful oft wuldres sweg
text.152: þær we ymb hine utan      ealle hofan,
text.154: drihtne sædon.      Nu ic eom dædum fah,
text.155: gewundod mid wommum;      sceal nu þysne wites clom
text.16: and heanne holm.      Hwa is þæt ðe cunne
text.161: attre gelicost,      þonne he ut þorhdraf:
text.164: Eala dæg leohta!      Eala dream godes!
text.166: Eala þæt ic eam ealles leas      ecan dreames,
text.167: þæt ic mid handum ne mæg      heofon geræcan,
text.168: ne mid eagum ne mot      up locian,
text.169: ne huru mid earum ne sceal      æfre geheran
text.171: ðæs ic wolde of selde      sunu meotodes,
text.172: drihten adrifan,      and agan me þæs dreames gewald,
text.173: wuldres and wynne,      me þær wyrse gelamp
text.174: þonne ic to hihte      agan moste.
text.175: Nu ic eom asceaden      fram þære sciran driht,
text.176: alæded fram leohte      in þone laðan ham.
text.177: Ne mæg ic þæt gehicgan      hu ic in ðæm becwom,
text.179: aworpen of worulde.      Wat ic nu þa
text.18: Dreamas he gedelde,      duguðe and geþeode,
text.180: þæt bið alles leas      ecan dreamas
text.181: se ðe heofencyninge      heran ne þenceð,
text.183: wean and witu      and wrace dreogan,
text.185: þæs ðe ic geþohte adrifan      drihten of selde,
text.188: Hwearf þa to helle      þa he gehened wæs,
text.189: godes andsaca;      dydon his gingran swa,
text.19: Adam ærest,      and þæt æðele cyn,
text.190: gifre and grædige,      þa hig god bedraf
text.191: in þæt hate hof      þam is hel nama.
text.193: þæt he ne abælige      bearn waldendes.
text.194: Læte him to bysne      hu þa blacan feond
text.196: Neoman us to wynne      weoroda drihten,

text.199: mihta miccle,      þa he þa mænego adraf,
text.20: engla ordfruman,      þæt þe eft forwarð.
text.200: hæftas of ðæm hean selde.      Gemunan we þone halgan drihten,
text.201: ecne in wuldre      mid alra gescefta ealdre;

text.205: sibbe and snytero;      gemunan soð and riht,

text.208: þonne behofað      se ðe her wunað
text.209: weorulde wynnum      þæt him wlite scine
text.21: ðuhte him on mode      þæt hit mihte swa,
text.210: þonne he oðer lif      eft geseceð,
text.212: is þær wlitig and wynsum,      wæstmas scinað,
text.213: beorhte ofer burgum.      þær is brade lond,
text.216: þær he sylfa sit,      sigora waldend,
text.217: drihten hælend,      in ðæm deoran ham,
text.218: and ymb þæt hehsetl      hwite standað
text.22: þæt hie weron seolfe      swegles brytan,
text.221: wordum and weorcum.      Heora wlite scineð
text.222: geond ealra worulda woruld      mid wuldorcyninge.
text.223: ða get ic furðor gefregen      feond ondetan;
text.224: wæs him eall ful strang wom and witu;      hæfdon wuldorcyning
text.228: uppe on earde.      Sceolon nu æfre þæs

text.248: gif ge willað minre      mihte gelefan.

text.250: weroda waldend,      agan us þis wuldres leoht,
text.251: eall to æhte.      þis is idel gylp

text.258: rice haldeð.      He is ana cyning,

text.328: uppe mid englum.      Wæron þa alles þæs

text.576: on seolfres sinc;      him þæt swearte forgeald
text.578: Siteð nu on þa swiðran hond      sunu his fæderes;
text.58: Wendes ðu ðurh wuldor      ðæt þu woruld ahtest,
text.581: geond middangeard.      þæt is monegum cuð
text.582: þæt he ana is      ealra gescefta
text.583: wyrhta and waldend      þurh his wuldres cræft.
text.584: Siteð him on heofnum      halig encgel,
text.585: waldend mid witegum.      Hafað wuldres bearn
text.587: Leaðað us þider to leohte      þurh his læcedom,
text.588: þær we moton seolfe      sittan mid drihtne,
text.589: uppe mid englum,      habban þæt ilce leoht,
text.59: alra onwald,      and we englas mid ðec.
text.590: þær his hired nu      halig eardað,
text.591: wunað in wynnum,      þær is wuldres bled
text.594: Criste cweman.      þær is cuðre lif
text.595: þonne we on eorðan mægen      æfre gestreonan.
text.596: Hafað nu geþingod to us      þeoden mæra,
text.60: Atol is þin onseon!      Habbað we alle swa
text.602: þonne of þisse moldan      men onwecnað;
text.603: deade of duste arisað      þurh drihtnes miht.
text.604: þæt bið daga lengust,      and dinna mæst
text.606: waldend mid wolcnum      in þas woruld færeð.
text.608: on twa healfe,      tile and yfle.
text.609: Him þa soðfæstan      on þa swiðran hond
text.611: þonne beoð bliðe      þa in burh moton
text.613: and heo gesenað      mid his swiðran hond
text.615: "Ge sind wilcuman!      Gað in wuldres leoht
text.616: to heofona rice,      þær ge habbað
text.618: þonne stondað þa forworhtan,      þa ðe firnedon;
text.619: beoð beofigende      hwonne him bearn godes
text.62: Segdest us to soðe      þæt ðin sunu wære
text.620: deman wille      þurh his dæda sped.
text.621: Wenað þæt heo moten      to þære mæran byrig
text.622: up to englum      swa oðre dydon,
text.626: ofostum miclum.      Nu ic eow ne con."
text.627: Sona æfter þæm wordum      werige gastas,
text.63: meotod moncynnes;      hafustu nu mare susel!"
text.630: in þæt sceaðena scræf,      scufað to grunde
text.631: in þæt nearwe nið,      and no seoððan
text.632: þæt hie up þonan      æfre moton,
text.633: ah þær geþolian sceolon      earmlic wite,
text.634: clom and carcern,      and þone caldan grund
text.636: hu hie him on edwit      oft asettað
text.640: þone þe hie him to hihte      habban sceoldon.
text.641: Uton, la, geþencan      geond þas worulde,
text.643: Georne þurh godes gife      gemunan gastes bled,
text.646: þær is geat gylden      gimmum gefrætewod,
text.647: wynnum bewunden,      þæm þe in wuldres leoht
text.649: and ymb þa weallas      wlitige scinað
text.654: cyning in cestre.      Cweþað ealle þus:
text.659: þegnas ymb þeoden,      þær is þrym micel,
text.66: on cearum cwidum.      Crist heo afirde,
text.660: sang æt selde,      is sylf cyning,
text.661: ealra aldor,      in ðære ecan gesceft.
text.662: þæt is se drihten,      seðe deað for us
text.665: metod mancynnes,      þurh his mildsa sped.
text.666: þa gewearð þone weregan,      þe ær aworpen wæs
text.667: of heofonum      þæt he in helle gedeaf,
text.669: Brohte him to bearme      brade stanas,
text.670: bæd him for hungre      hlafas wyrcan--
text.679: atol þurh edwit,      and on esle ahof,
text.680: herm bealowes gast,      and on beorh astah,
text.684: folc and foldan.      Foh hider to me
text.685: burh and breotone      bold to gewealde,
text.686: rodora rices,      gif þu seo riht cyning
text.687: engla and monna,      swa ðu ær myntest."
text.69: hæfdon hym to hyhte      helle floras,
text.690: Satanus seolf;      þe is susl weotod
text.692: Ah ic þe hate      þurh þa hehstan miht
text.693: þæt ðu hellwarum      hyht ne abeode,
text.694: ah þu him secgan miht      sorga mæste,
text.696: cyning moncynnes.      Cer ðe on bæcling!
text.697: Wite þu eac, awyrgda,      hu wid and sid
text.698: helheoðo dreorig,      and mid hondum amet.
text.699: Grip wið þæs grundes;      gang þonne swa
text.7: meotod on mihtum,      and alne middangeard.
text.700: oððæt þu þone ymbhwyrft      alne cunne,
text.701: and ærest amet      ufan to grunde,
text.702: and hu sid seo      se swarta eðm.
text.703: Wast þu þonne þe geornor      þæt þu wið god wunne,
text.704: seoððan þu þonne hafast      handum ametene
text.705: hu heh and deop      hell inneweard seo,
text.708: þæt ðu merced hus      ameten hæbbe."
text.709: þa þam werigan wearð      wracu getenge.
text.710: Satan seolua ran      and on susle gefeol,
text.711: earm æglece.      Hwilum mid folmum mæt
text.712: wean and witu.      Hwilum se wonna læg
text.713: læhte wið þes laþan.      Hwilum he licgan geseah
text.714: hæftas in hylle.      Hwilum hream astag,
text.715: ðonne he on þone atolan      eagum gesawun.
text.717: blac bealowes gast,      þæt he on botme stod.
text.718: þa him þuhte      þæt þanon wære
text.72: earme æglecan,      geond þæt atole scref,
text.720: mila gemearcodes,      swa hine se mihtiga het
text.722: ða he gemunde      þæt he on grunde stod.
text.723: Locade leas wiht      geond þæt laðe scræf,
text.724: atol mid egum,      oððæt egsan gryre
text.726: Wordum in witum      ongunnon þa werigan gastas
text.728: "La, þus beo nu on yfele!      Noldæs ær teala!"
text.73: for ðam anmedlan      þe hie ær drugon.
text.76: seoððan he ðes wites      worn gefelde.
text.78: fyre and atre;      ne bið swelc fæger dream
text.80: "Ic wæs iu in heofnum      halig ængel,
text.81: dryhtene deore;      hefde me dream mid gode,
text.82: micelne for meotode,      and ðeos menego swa some.
text.83: þa ic in mode      minum hogade
text.85: bearn helendes,      agan me burga gewald
text.86: eall to æhte,      and ðeos earme heap
text.87: þe ic hebbe to helle      ham geledde.
text.88: Wene þæt tacen sutol      þa ic aseald wes on wærgðu,
text.89: niðer under nessas      in ðone neowlan grund.
text.90: Nu ic eow hebbe to hæftum      ham gefærde
text.91: alle of earde.      Nis her eadiges tir,
text.93: ne ængla ðreat,      ne we upheofon
text.94: agan moten.      Is ðes atola ham
text.95: fyre onæled.      Ic eom fah wið god.
text.96: æce æt helle duru      dracan eardigað,
text.97: hate on reðre;      heo us helpan ne magon.
text.98: Is ðæs walica ham      wites afylled;
text.99: nagan we ðæs heolstres      þæt we us gehydan mægon

source: The Complete Corpus of Anglo-Saxon Poetry
